content.query:
CREATE TABLE dbo.materialized_nyc_taxi
(
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    trip_duration_minutes FLOAT,
    VendorID BIGINT,
    passenger_count FLOAT,
    RatecodeID FLOAT,
    store_and_fwd_flag VARCHAR(10),
    PULocationID BIGINT,
    DOLocationID BIGINT,
    payment_type BIGINT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
    airport_fee FLOAT,
    ingest_time DATETIME2,
    source VARCHAR(50),
    pickup_datetime DATETIME2,
    dropoff_datetime DATETIME2,
    passenger_bucket VARCHAR(20),
    ratecode_desc VARCHAR(50),
    payment_desc VARCHAR(50),
    taxi_type VARCHAR(20),
    year INT,
    tip_percent FLOAT,
    avg_speed_kmph FLOAT,
    duration_bucket VARCHAR(20),
    net_revenue FLOAT,
    anomaly_flag BIGINT
);

COPY INTO dbo.materialized_nyc_taxi
FROM
    'https://nyctripsadls.blob.core.windows.net/nyctrips/gold/trip-data/'
WITH (
    FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET',
    CREDENTIAL = (IDENTITY= 'Managed Identity')
);
